normalised: Maka konnen tori vicharlem hanv mhazo ut'tom chai koso kortam mhunn! Bare, tem rocket science nhoi, punn mapnam M-U-K-H-E-L! Poilem, hanv ek chottkulea patelean dhedd cup udok ukhollttam. Sarkea akarachem vaprunk zai, tuka khobor asa? Zaitench vhodd, ani udok vegim sukhota.

Uprant, hanv don chamcha chai patti uddtam. Konnank tori tezk zai, dekhun tim dhedd don chamcha uddunk xoktat, punn maka don sarkem dista. Magir, mosale! Hanv sadharonnponni sumar ek chatthai chamcha elchi vaitttat ani zaite zanna ek chuttki – sumar ek atthaim chamcha – sunth pitti. Zori maka tallnim sunth asa, hanv sumar ek centimeter tukddo ghasun ghetam. Mhoje monacher adharit asa, satyan sangta.

unnormalised: Maka konnen tor mhojem perfect chai koxem kortam mhunn vicharlem! Bare, tem rocket science nhui, punn mapam important! Poile, ek lhan saucepanant 1.5 cup udok uballta. Right size vaprunk zai, tumka zanna? Khup vhodd zalear, udok khub vegin evaporate zata.
normalised: Nimannem, ek-don minute zatkoch, hanv addho cup dud ani sumar ek table chamcha sakor uddtam. Ani ek minute va don minute ukhollonk di, ani voile! Ut'tom chai, dor vellar. Chav ghe ani tuka zai toshi sakor bodol. Sukh ghe!

unnormalised: Uprant, hanv 2 tsp chai patti ghatam. Konnak zait asli zalear, te 2.5 tsp ghattele astole, punn maka 2 perfect dista. Magir, masale! Hanv sadharan 1/4 tsp velchi grind kortam ani kiteak na thoddi – sumar 1/8 tsp – sunth powder. Maka tazem sunth aslem zalear, hanv sumar 1 cm tukdo grate kortam. Mhojem moodacher depend asa, tbh.

Nimannem, tem 2-3 minitam brew zalem mhunnlear, hanv 1/2 cup dudh ani sumar 1 tbsp sakhar ghatam. Ani ek minut vo don minutam simmer korunk divya, ani voila! Perfect chai, dor pavtim. Taste kor ani tumche avdde pormonnem sakhar adjust kara. Enjoy kara!
